metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12942 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
libunrar.a in UnRAR before 5.5.7 has a buffer overflow in theUnpack::LongLZ function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunrar5 - 1:5.5.8-1
unrar - 1:5.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.5.8-1').
